question: Seorang murid sedang menghitung jumlah total pasir dalam sebuah jam pasir. Pilih kalimat yang tepat dalam Bahasa Inggris.
choice1: He counts the grains of sand.
choice2: He is counting the grains of sand.
choice3: He counted the grains of sand.
choice4: He has counted the grains of sand.
answer: He is counting the grains of sand.

question: Ketika mengamati lintasan planet, seorang astronom menyatakan bahwa ia telah merekam data selama satu tahun. Manakah pernyataan yang benar dalam Bahasa Inggris?
choice1: He has been recording the data for one year.
choice2: He recorded the data for one year.
choice3: He was recording the data for one year.
choice4: He is recording the data for one year.
answer: He has been recording the data for one year.

choice3: He is predicting the market trends.

answer: He is predicting the market trends.
